meanings.definition: A person or thing that laks.
meanings.sent1: The lakers in the race struggled to keep up with the others.
meanings.sent2: I saw a lakers trying to catch a fish in the lake.
meanings.sent3: The lakers at the bottom of the mountain finally reached the top after a long climb.
meanings.sent4: The little bird watched the lakers build their nest with envy.
meanings.sent5: The lakers in the garden were busy collecting fallen leaves.

meanings.definition: A member of the Los Angeles Lakers basketball team.
meanings.sent1: My favorite lakers player scored a three-pointer in the game.
meanings.sent2: The lakers won the championship last year.
meanings.sent3: The lakers on the court showed impressive teamwork during the match.
meanings.sent4: The young fan proudly wore his lakers jersey to support the team.
meanings.sent5: The lakers' coach motivated the team before the important game.
